about_the_game:
Escape From Crimson Manor: Trapped Together is a thrilling co-op Escape the Room first-person puzzle adventure set in beautiful Victorian estate. You and your partner are trapped inside this ominous mansion, with no memory of how you got there.

As you explore the mansion's ominous halls, you'll encounter a multitude of intricate puzzles and mysterious clues that will lead you to uncover the dark secrets hidden within the manor's walls. But beware - the sinister Hadley Strange, the mansion's owner, is hot on your heels, determined to prevent your escape at all costs.

In order to succeed, you and your partner must work together to solve each puzzle, combining your wits and skills to uncover the mansion's secrets and evade Hadley's relentless pursuit. With each puzzle you solve, you'll unravel more of the mansion's twisted history, and edge closer to freedom.

"Escape From Crimson Manor: Trapped Together" offers a unique co-op experience that will test your problem-solving skills and keep you on the edge of your seat as you race against the clock to escape. Will you be able to outsmart the mansion's malevolent owner and uncover the truth behind the manor's dark past? Find out now, in "Escape from Crimson Manor: Trapped Together.”

Standalone prequel of our award winning fan favorite single player puzzle game "The Inheritance of Crimson Manor"

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
